content.detailedDescription: I was driving in i-101 northbound going to san francisco ca. at around 4:45am, it was dark when i saw a cigar like white led light with perfect led square with blue led light in the front, with was like an airplane descending into a ramp, but before descending into ground it disappeared, and i was waiting to see a an explosion or something but nothing more happened. just disappeared in front of me. the lights were perfectly marked perfect cigar shape and the block in the front was blue end perfectly formed despite the distance and the lights were firm. it lasted only while it crossed the my path,..Three to four seconds..., this was the second time i sow something similar in my life.
content.summary: Cigar like, with blue tip,.Led light straight path like airplane landing

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back patio on my pcell hone talkingto my brother approximately 9:18 pm central time on 5/10/2014. during the conversation i happened to look out over the trees and saw a a glowing, reddish, orange light stationary position, told my brother gottago i think i see a ufo or something and immediately hung up to free up my camera on my iphone 3s. i was able to snap a picture. it appeared almost like a flare gun emergency signal. but i dont believe it was,it didn't move. i saw it for about 45 seconds before i could get to take a picture looking up and down on the light and phone. i finally snapped a picture but what i saw was clear but the photo appears to be fuzzy because it was dark out but it was extremely bright.Then it just disappeared. just was gone. i never heard anything but it was off in the near distance.I was very apprehensive. i contacted a local tv station and also 911. neither had any reports of any suspicious lights. i made a call to mufon and got voicemail and left my information. they called back and this is my 2nd contact. phone/email
content.summary: Saw a glowing reddish-orange very bright light,that appeared hovering and was stationary above the trees in the distancthen disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was watching television in my living room when i saw the lights of the object. i didn't know what the object was. the object was triangular with orange lights at the corners. it flew very slowly in a straight line. my feeling was curiosity. things like this have been seen by many people in our area, but have always had red orange lights. i lost sight of the object when it past the tree line. i tried to report this at the time it happened but was cut off in the middle of the report,
content.summary: Huge triangular object with orange lights at corners, moving very slowly

content.detailedDescription: Early morning, june 4th 2014, looking out my door at the sky, thought i saw movement, 3 bright lights in the distance coming across the mountain from se. stepped inside for cell phone, set it for record, stepped outside, objects were now the size of basketballs, kept getting larger. i aimed camera at first object, could not capture all three at the same time, able to get 5 seconds, recorder stopped.  stepped back inside an reset phone to picture, captured other two.  sat unbelieving and mesmerized for about 10 min. 1st orb began to move closer and downward, was convinced it was headed at me.  suddenly another dimmer comet-like, (had a tail) object streaked in near the orb towards the earth.  both passed out of view around the edge of the house.  i had seen the same comet like object earlier in the spring while driving to work one night, it seemed familiar to me the moment it appeared on june 4th.  my attention was then focused on the 2 other obs, slowly moving down across the mountain, through the trees about 50-100 yards away, the one on the left sunk below vision, the one on the right passed through the trees while descending.  this caused it to appear to be blinking.  i finally lost sight of it.  sat for another minute and then immediately went in the house and poured a drink.  got online and sent a facebook message to my daughters about the incident, the message time is 2:21 am on june 4th.  completely forgot about the video and picture until june 5th.  when i called them up the video time stamp read  08/19/2013  08:25 pm;  the pic of the 2 orbs is  08/19/2013  08:33 pm.  all my other recordings are accurate.  i was stunned by this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three very bright slow moving orbs, then a dimmer fourth, comet-like  streaking downward

content.detailedDescription: I was walking off the porch at 8 to 8:10 p.M on april 15, 2014 and looked up and seen the airplane then saw a bright object following behind the airplane. i took one photo. i only witnessed this event for maybe 30 seconds. when i looked at the photo and zoomed in on the craft that's when i realized what i was looking at was not just a orb of light. it was a strange dark triangler, pyramid shaped craft.
content.summary: Strange triangler, perimid dark shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: I was heading home from work friday morning around 12:am. i just went over a little bridge and up the hill, when i saw a bright yellow pulsating light with little white lights on the outside edges. i slowed down, turned off my radio and open the passenger window to get a better view. i thought that it may have been a tractor in the field, but i didn't hear an engine sound. it was heading south at a slow pace, it picked up speed when i slowed to watch it. the yellow light was very bright as i had to squint to look at it. as i rounded the bend in the road, it disappeared. i don't know where it went and i didn't see any lights in my rearview mirror. i thought to myself, that was pretty weird. i keep driving home and would go back to look when it was daylight, to see if there was a tractor marks or field lights.
content.summary: Heading home on hwy 99w, driving towards amity, saw bright yellow light with light clear lights on edges

content.detailedDescription: This is my second sighting you have a record of only this time it had a shape. it was shaped like a long triangle with lights at tips where the triangle was formed though more defined in shape than my last reporting it appeared in almost the same place i reported it at first. betwee two houses on the opposite side of the street. clearly visible . i will keep watching the sky to report if it happens again, thank you mr. andrew de vito
content.summary: Second sighting only more defined

content.detailedDescription: I have seen this phenomenon before years ago .. i was sitting on my front porch way before sun up and venus was up due east .. 5:13am and all of a sudden i realized something else was in view .. moving .. came out from behind a porch structure (post) .. was visible for five seconds and then turned its self off perhaps by rotating to a non reflective belly surface .. but it was still moving after it turned off because just a trace of the bright surface was still showing .. it reminded me of a manned space orbit coming directly over me .. fast, glorious and then gone .. but this should not have turned off as it was high in the east and the sun was not that far from the horizon as to shut anything off.
content.summary: I was gazing east and object appeared traveling south to north .. came out from behind a pourch support .. there very bright .. disappeared .. but seemed to be spinning to a non reflective surface .. thin trace after main reflection disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was home alone watching tv an i felt a sound vibrating sound an felt like the house was humming an i stood up an looked out my side window an seen nothing i then went to my other window which points to the other side of the house an i was 3 orange glowing light in a rectangle from an it was moving very slow   i watched in disbelief an i was to be honest very afraid ���. an it stayed in front of my home for at least 4 to 5 mins an the lights disappeared like someone hitting the switch..   i have seen this same craft above my previous farm home less than 2 years ago ���. i know u get many reports but my husband saw this same craft the first time with me   i won't lie we did have some drinks but i know what i saw an after watch this a show on the history channel the same craft.
content.summary: Was on my couch watching tv an i felt it an heard a humming vibrating sound an looked out my window an saw it

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday, june 8, 2014 2:35pm clear skies- was driving down camino del avion st, just before i hit niguel road st, saw a transparent like object hovering about 200ft above the ground, about 5/600 ft ahead of me. at first i thought it was a flock of seagulls, but as i drove closer i realized it was not. was a green light at the signal ahead of me, but the car next to me stopped to watch the object as it hovered in front of us as well. it went very slow, in a straight path, heading east, towards inland. (moved to my left). looked as if it was a transparent flickering light in shape of saturn, almost as if it was being projected...But during broad daylight. it looked as if it was the size of a small car, but it was hard to tell from a distance. i watched it all the way until it hovered right over san marin homes, toward beacon hill and l lost sight due to it being over a hill. 
as far as my feeling towards this sighting, i have had a prior ufo sighting, but for some reason this one got to me. i almost just continued driving and ignored it but something told me i needed to stop and figure out what the heck i was looking at. and i didn't feel so crazy because the car next to me saw it too! i turned around to go up a hill to see if i could see it again and it was gone :(
content.summary: Transparent like object hovering over road/hill

content.detailedDescription: Just on my nightly walk.. when two bright star like objects appeared by the moon.. the video doesn't do it justice..
content.summary: Two lights appeared by the moon.. very bright at first

content.detailedDescription:
This even occurred as a teenager mid 1080's.  

my family and i were watching television one night. 
our tv faced south, on the side of the driveway which had no roof at the time.  no cop cars passed our streets nor no one was there.  the unusual characteristic of these reflections was that all colors flashed independently from each other but from one point, from what i remember.  it appear to hit the middle of the window pane and colors spread to each individual colors (white, red/orange, bluish/green.

that's late night a flash of multi-colors reflected off our living room window panes.  in my home, no glass is used in the windows, so the light reflected off the white window metallic panes into our living room and into our eyes.  the colors appears to separate like a rainbow.  we heard a swish sound.  the object seems to appear over our house and traveling across from street to back yard or going east. we used to have the door open to the street so we ran outside to see what it was but it must have been pretty low because under the clear night, we didn't see anything in the sky, however, i called my grandmother who live east of where we lived and we asked her if she saw something that night in the sky and she exclaimed she did.  but when i asked what she saw, she didn't want to speak about it.

my entire family experienced this event.  it was something i cannot forget.  i did not speak about this till i was in my late 20's and i asked my mom if it was a dream or reality.  she remembered that day and that confirmed that our experience was real.

i was always searching for anyone else who might have seen it or at least an even during that time, but i have not yet.  hopefully i find it here at your site.
content.summary: Flashing color lights through living room window

content.detailedDescription: Just happen to look out my window and seen this small light dot moving very fast up, down, side to side very fast. not sure what it was. show my friend and he told me to pass it on to someone. so here i am doing so. you need to look and you can see dot light moving.
content.summary: This i seen out my window. it went on for some time but i had to leave. so stoped the recording.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work heading north on i-95 just about to turn onto the john turner butler exit when i looked up and saw a metallic sphere with an extremely bright white light, almost glowing around the object zoom by at a very incredible, non-earthly speed. the object was moving so fast and almost looked as if it was descending or curving downwards behind trees near the highway without slowing, however i do not think it could have landed at that speed and survived. the object was about the size of a golf ball from my view, much larger than a star and the light was so bright it seemed like an ''eyeball'' with the metallic part being the pupil and the light the exterior. it moved so fast it had an inch long tail of light ( from my view out of the windshield )and as it passed i heard a very faint high pitched whistle. the object headed north parallel to i-95 but i could not tell if it descended or just disappeared out of sight, from the very high rate of speed. it lasted only about 10 seconds so by the time i had my phone in hand it was long gone. i am curious to know if anyone else witnessed this.
content.summary: Metallic sphere enveloped in a very bright white light moving extremely fast the light trailed like a tail, may have crashed/landed, no sound

content.detailedDescription: Taking pictures of the bright clouds. then i said to my boyfriend sometimes you see things up there in your photos and he says yes you do . the. i looked t my photos when i sat down . i said hey look wow there it is he couldn't be live it me either but i do . so he tried it didn't work  it on my phone it did.I got pretty excited i was in awwa . then i just kept taking pictures .It got dark .
content.summary: Wow i was taking pictures of the clouds because  at the photos there was the picture .Hen i took the picture i didn't see thoses ufos .Iv seen them before but this time i'm reporting this time .My boyfriend went out there to see of he can get that on his

content.detailedDescription: Approx. 2:30 am. wednesday june 4 2014. i was outside sitting on my back patio on my phone shopping online and smoking a cigarette. i dont know what made me lookup from my phone, but when i did, thats when i noticed a yellowish-orange light (it kinda looked like it was outlined in red)moving lower in the sky. i turned my phone off because screen was too bright and i wanted to see this light better. at first, i thought it was a star but quickly realized it wasn't. it was maybe 100 feet in the air decending in a sort of curved 45 degree angle moving at a slow rate of speed. once it got to the treetop it slowed almost to a stop, but looked as if it was bobbing up and down like floating on water. then it moved to the right, and then back to the left. then started decending very slowly. at this point, its behind the tree but i can still see it. it gave me the impression that it was "busy" doing something, like it was there for a purpose.  it would hover and bob up and down and continue to decend. i watched it until it was so low that my back yard fence was in the way of me seeing it anymore.  i was able to see it until it was about 8 feet off the ground. also , where this light is hovering,  there are houses right by the tree its behind and there was a dog barking in that area. i didnt attempt to take pictures or video because #1 i was too scared and #2 i didnt think my pbone would do well picking up the light behind a tree that was probably about 150 feet away. i cant quit thinking about what i saw. i remember i was scared and i wanted to wake my husband up so he could see it too but he was out of town. i told him about it when he got home.
content.summary: Starlike but about the size of 4 stars put together. it decended at a curved 45 degree angle and slowed down at treetop level. it bobbed up and down like it was floating on water. moved left to right a couple times and slowly decended behind tree.

content.detailedDescription: We were on fremont st watching a concert looked up saw a object moving in the sky followed it till it disappeared behind building.Was surprised because it did not look like a  airplane or helicopter.Was able to get a short video of it.Looked white oval shaped no sound due to music playing.
content.summary: White object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were at the mcdonalds drive up window picking up our order. my husband was driving when something caught my eye out my window to the right. looking south to se i saw about 5 white glowing balls of lights that appeared to be objects. the were coming at a slanted position as if they were in formation with the largest one landing first and the other one's following same path line.

 when i first seen them i yelled look at my husband so he too witness them. there could have been six of them it's hard to remember. they appeared to be landing several miles from us but not over 5 miles. my husband looked at the girl waiting on us at the window and said, "did you see that?" she stated, "yes, i don't know what that was and i want to know what it was!"

i told my husband let's go home and watch the news that was just too many objects coming down and landing for other people not to have seen that. that night on the news they said a lot of people in eastern kansas city had seen some lights and they checked it out and it was just outer space junk coming down and burning up in the atmosphere.

my husband is a pilot so i laughed at what they were saying and i asked him if he thought what we had seen was space junk burning up. he said, "hell no, not unless space junk flies in formation and comes in like it is landing. i agree with him it did not look like random space junk coming down and i am convinced it was ufo's landing out in a wooded area just south of us.

the really strange thing about this case is that 13 years earlier my brother saw a ufo land in the same general area.  looking from where i saw these lights land was as the crow flies, the same direction as my brother's sighting only 13 years later! due south of my sighting would have been around 6200 george kansas city mo. there was and still is a lot of woods in that area. my brother's mufon case # is 56962. i am now a mufon field investigator and felt even after all these years i should report the case because of it's strangeness.
content.summary: Saw about 5 large bright white objects come in at an angle and appeared to land.

content.detailedDescription: On october 25, 2012, at approx. 2:15 in the afternoon i was sitting out the back door of my shop at my house when something flew by from the north very high up in the sky to the south and caught my attention. i stood up and looked over my house when something extremely bright to the east way far away  and way high up in the sky shot a beam like a laser and hurt my eyes. this larger bright orb seemed to have somewhat sent three orbs to the west which by then was over my house straight up and a little to the east. two of them did a right angle turn and then went straight up out of sight while the third orb did a left angle sharp turn and seemed to have traveled several miles to the north and instantly turned the opposite direction which was to the south in just seconds and disappeared. i ran in the house to get my camera to take a photo of this event. i was  absolutely terrified. when i came out the back door of my shop there was two more very bright orbs coming from the east and i started taking pictures of these two orbs. they went straight up into the sky where i could not see them anymore when another group of very bright orbs, 16 of them, were maneuvering in different patterns and configurations to the west in what seemed to be a straight line doing stunts i have never in my life seen like this. i don't really know how long i was taking pictures of these orbs. i just know i kept on taking pictures until this group of 16 orbs finally went over my house to the west where i could not see them anymore because the sun was to the west over my roof. all of these orbs were the same size except the large one in the beginning of this event. at times they would turn the color blue just like the color of the sky that day. note, there are not any clouds at all and then they would turn very bright like shiny stars again. the photos i'm allowed to send to you are some of the best of 42 photos i took that day. i would say they were flying 30,000 to 50,000 feet in the air. there were not any contrails of any kind and there was no sound of any kind. i showed my wife these photos that day when she came from work but i'm afraid to talk to anyone about this because it will completely destroy my credibility and reputation. i play music in public for a living and this would i'm sure end my public life. i have tried to show some of these pictures to family members and they think i'm a lunatic of which i am not! i have real bad insomnia since that time and i just can't stop having nightmares night after night after night! please try at least to help me to understand what i'm going through. i did not want to take these photos and story to the government because it would most definitely ruin me. i am not crazy. thank you for at least seeing my photos and hearing my story. i have nothing to gain and everything to lose.  thank you for your time on this matter.
content.summary: Very bright lights 22 orbs in all, 16 flew in a path, the others flew out of sight faster that anything i've ever seen!

content.detailedDescription: I and an older friend who lived about 5 houses down from me met at a designated time to hang out. i was meeting him and another friend and i and him arrived first at the entrance of a cove in a neighborhood located less than a quarter of a mile from highway 64 and houston levee road. we were facing each other talking waiting on the third friend ,who lived in the cove, to come outside. he was in the middle of saying something when i noticed an aircraft headed our direction behind him. i cut him off and said, "look at this helicopter coming" as i noticed it was very low and headed right for us. he said, "thats not a helicopter." as it approached very close. it soon became apparent that this was a massive triangle with bright white lights. one on each tip making three lights and a light in the middle of the object. it was so low to the ground and moving so slow i could have picked up a rock and hit it. i would estimate it traveling at around 5 mph with a powerful humming/vibration sound or feeling eminating from it. we were both awe struck and just started running back to our houses as fast as we could. it was just known to run and tell someone at home. i ran inside and upstairs to my moms bathroom were she was takin a bath and started telling her through the door what we had seen. she broke into what i was saying and asked if thats why the walls were vibrating and she heard a strange humming noise. the path that the object was taking was straight as can be and went directly over my house. i said yea. the next day people from around our area of shelby co. were calling into radio stations to report the same sighting. later on in life..Maybe 2 or 3 years (im 26 now) i learned of the events in belgium and the events in illinois of reports of a triangle shaped ufo, some people who said they saw it were military personel and police. the object photographed in the belgium case in the i think early 90's is exactly what we saw and i feel a sense of pride knowing i saw this same object very very close and at an extremely slow rate of speed. almost as if it didnt care. thinking back ( it is very vivid) i saw no means of propulsion only a humming noise. it was massive and was directly above us. very intimidating and instantly when its close enough to be seen one knows immediantly it is something very diffrent. i have felt a sense of enlightenment since. that was eleven years ago and i haven't seen anything else odd execept for a cylinder shaped very large craft moving very very fast at a really high altitude. that was about 3 years ago. i cant help but feel that this was a special moment i will remember forever becuase i no longer question ufos and the closeness of this object almost seemed as if it wanted me to see it.
content.summary: Very close to us. triangular in shape. blue and white lights. brief but very very close.

content.detailedDescription:
I was running late for work one morning around 7:50 a.M. therefore no one else was outside with me. i looked up to the north and saw a very dark blackish object hovering over building 1. it was about 30 feet above the building then started moving very slowly about 3-5 mph.

 it was still dark out just starting to break light which made the object very hard to see. i could not see any lights on it or windows it then turned more to the west slowly went over two other buildings. it was shaped like an sr 71 or a stingray shape.

i went inside the gate and ran to the upstairs where i could look out the windows and it was gone. i talked with other people there but no one else had seen it.
content.summary: Going into work at lake city ammunition plant i saw a large blackish object hovering over building one. i watched if for a couple  of minutes and then is slowly went over the next couple of buildings before i had to enter the plant.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Unknown
content.detailedDescription: In may 1976, at ~7:00am, i was standing at the end of our driveway, in front of the mailboxes and gas tanks/lines, waiting for the school bus. while looking east down the road in the direction the bus would come, i noticed a silvery, metallic, pill shaped object  <1/4 mile down the road, north east of my position, at an ~45 degree angle above the horizon with the apparent size of a dime or penny and with what looked like black square panels/windows all around the middle, with something like a heat haze shimmer around it, travelling very slowly, almost hovering, in a south westerly direction crossing at <45 degree angle the road which runs east - west. i had no idea what it was, but was young and curious, as i always enjoyed watching the hueys that would fly overhead all the time back then. however i knew that the object was not a normal aircraft as it had no wings or tail and was moving way too slowly, and it was not a helicopter as it had no rotors and did not make any noise at all. over the course of the next ~3 to 5 minutes i watched it in stunned silence until it disappeared behind the tree line on the hill <1/8 mile due south of where i was standing. it did not reemerge from the tree line on the other side where i expected to see it and either landed, stopped/hovered, changed course to the south, or something while it was out of sight behind the trees/hill. i noticed on the satellite map that i did the sketch on for this report that there is, or at least was when the satellite photo was taken, a round depression ~100feet/200feet in diameter in the ground in a field behind the tree line on the hill right about where i would have lost sight of the object, i have never been to that depression to the best of my recollection, especially since i didn't know it was even there till just a few minutes ago when i went to make the map and saw it on the satellite image ... i am still shocked that it was right where the object would have been when i lost sight of it. i do not know if it would still be there today, since i don't know when the satellite image was taken. i wanted to go up the hill and see if i could see anything, but i knew the bus was coming and stayed put. i never mentioned this object to the bus driver who came a few minutes later, nor to my teacher, parents, or sister. in fact i never mentioned the object to anyone, although my family is aware of my encounter later that day with the ape-man like entity. i could clearly see the object which the upper and lower domed surfaces were silvery grey metallic with the center diameter composed of flat glossy black panels/windows, there was a suggestion of a clear dome on the top and/or bottom, though my angle nor the lighting was good enough to be certain, and it had no navigation lights that i could see, or would expect on an aircraft or helicopter. ~12 hours later that evening ~7:00pm i spotted a large, ape-man-like, reddish-brown fur covered entity, ~7foot/9foot tall judging by the size of the ~10foot/12foot tall tree next to it (which i estimate based on the size of the nearby excavator crane cab door height), standing upright ~200feet/300feet away from me on the ridge of the strip-mine above our house (<1/8 mile north west of my early morning sighting location) watching me while i was putting my bicycle away. when it saw me staring at it, it grabbed the tree next to it with one hand and bent it over. seeing that, i dropped my bike and ran into the house, i told my parents, but my dad made me go back outside and finish putting my bike away :/ when i went back outside, the creature/entity was nowhere to be seen. i have been attending the mufon gatherings with my father-in-law (who is a member) for the past few years (in fact i was just at one last saturday), where i discovered that there are field investigators and a website for reporting. i am now retired (22 years) from the us navy as of february 2009, and do not see the harm in reporting it at this point. i am oddly still drawn to that area after ~38 years, although i only lived there a few years, and i hope that it might be able to help the field investigators with their research. please see the attached sketches/map and excuse my poor rendering skills. if any of the mufon field investigators are interested, i would be happy to show them the location.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Pill shaped object silvery metallic upper and lower domes and black panels or winows around the middle moving at a slow hovering path of ~1/4 mile over 3 - 5 minutes before going behind hill with a ape-man like entity sighted nearby 12 hours later

content.detailedDescription:
These photo's were taken from my back deck looking towards the treeline. the object hovered with no noise for a short time before it appeared to be turning end over end several times. there were no emissions. the place it was hovering is heavily wooded, non-residental, rural area. there are houses along the main road but none back in the woods along that treeline. there was never any sound. it didn't hover like a helicopter. it was very still. when it moved, it began going what looked like end over end several times before coming to a hover once again and then backing into the sky until it could no longer be seen. lasted approx. 5 minutes from when i saw it (i came onto my back deck and it was there, i do not know how long it had actually been there). 

we are accustomed to the regular flight paths of planes since they are easy to see out here in the country. this certainly was not a plane or helicopter. i have no idea what it was. the black part that appears on it looked like a band or stripe to me but honestly it was hard to tell. i did not see it land, i only saw it change directions end over end after the initial hovering. nothing came out of it that i saw. it moved very slowly but in ways that i've never seen an air object move ( appearing to turn itself end over end, front over bottom - like a sommersault).
content.summary: Looked as if went end over end while hovering. hovered over treeline. disappeared by moving backwards.

content.detailedDescription:
I was helping a friend put up window trim on a second story window. the window had a small roof right under it and we were on the roof and in the window working on it.

 we were facing north and we saw a craft about 10 feet in diameter hovering over trees about 200 feet from us. the one thing i remember most is how we could see heat waves coming off the bottom of the craft. it appeared to be very, very, hot on the bottom which was copper color and the top part of the craft was chrome colored. the object just hovered about 10 feet above the trees for a couple of minutes. my friend looked at me and said, "what the hell is that the second coming?"

my friend is now deceased so i can't ask him anything about what he saw. however, i do remember we were both very frighten about seeing it. then the craft took off to the east very slowly and appeared to be landing in the woods about 200-300 feet away. 

we were unable to see if it actually landed because of the trees but we did not see it leave either. we soon finished up our work and went down stairs to the living room and started talking about what we had seen. i left to go home about 20 minutes after seeing the craft. 

 my friend ask me to drive over to were thought it landed on my way home. i did drive by the woods and saw nothing. i was still so shook up over seeing this craft and i had a terrible fear of getting close to it, it was an strange feeling i had. this all happened at twilight so it was getting dark when we spotted the craft but still light enough to see it well.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw an object hovering over the trees with heat waves coming off the bottom of the craft. it  hovered there for a minute or two then turned to the east and appeared to land in the woods.

content.detailedDescription: On the afternoon of a fundraiser i was in the parking lot of a business where a fundraiser car wash and bbq was taking place. several bands were playing during the day. it was very hot with direct sun over head. most of us were against a wall that provided a small amount of shade. while watching a band playing to my right i noticed several objects (7) rising above the buildings roof. they looked like pearls, slightly elongated at the bottom. the tops were clearly solid and pearly colored silver grey and like a hard surface. the bottom looked slightly darker grey and unusual. they rose slowly a little uneven but overall at the same rate. i watched them for several moments but they didnt seem to be moving. so i watched the band for a couple moments and looked again and they had changed their positions. some at the same place some had risen to make a zig zag dot pattern. i looked at them more closely. they were not moving but had moved. they still looked the same a pearl white on top then a bit of silver grey on the sides and then turning darker grey for the final third of the bottom. i began to seriously think what could they be? i was analizing everything i felt they could be. balloons? no too stationary even though some had changed position some didnt if balloons they would floated away or all risen together they were pretty much evenly spaced and not moving. another song started so i watched for a couple minutes more and when i looked again they had risen higher some lower than the others some much higher still evenly spaced. the pattern looked something like the little dipper. they were not moving but moved when my attention was diverted. i looked away again after a minute or two and looked back and now they had changed again to a bigger formation like the big dipper( im no expert on the dippers but thats what they looked like to me) i had my phone with me for once but with no sd card for it my memory was full. so i had to delete two pics to free up the space. i took the two pics and went back to watching the show after a minute or two more i looked again and they were gone. i stepped out into the drive way and could see a 360 field of view . they were instantly gone from the entire sky. interesting to note that the photos show roundish white puffy cloud like objects and a strange black object that was not visible to the eye
content.summary: Objects rose above the nearby roof in horizonatal line, hovered then began to rise and fall made various patterns then were gone

content.detailedDescription: Discovered this photo on my trailcam this morning.  i assume the object was traveling north.  i assume the items came into the field of view of my trailcam from the right (s side) and was traveling to the left (n side) thus allowing my trailcam to capture the image.  i was actually outside grilling right next to my trailcam at this same time and heard nothing except a few large commercial aircraft leaving ord (chicago airport).
content.summary: Trailcam photo

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to the store with a group of friend in charlotte,nc on the night of june 6, 2014. as we were walking to the store when seen others looking into the sky towards the east of charlotte. there they were in the sky, at first glance they looked like stars but they were moving and pulsating with a beautiful white light glow they were also flicking in sync and flying in a flock like formation.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like flying pulsating stars

content.detailedDescription:
We had just picked up a pizza from the local gas station to feed some late night cravings at approx. 1:55am. we left the gas station and continued home.  when on our street within visual of our home, we saw the most incredibly blue/teal light with a hazy-trail of blue light emitting from it. 

i wasn't directly focused on the object but it was in my line of sight. the crazy blue light coming from it immediately grabbed my attention. it also grabbed the drivers attention as to which we were speechless. 

i think it could have been a meteor or something falling to earth. although i've never heard of things falling to earth being paired with an oddly teal blue light glowing leaving a trail. 

it shot down towards the earth diagonally to the left of the moon in our line of sight. 


we could not believe or understood what we just saw. we pulled into the driveway less than 100 feet away and got out staring into the sky looking for any trace of the object. nothing was to be seen.

this object was about a quarter of the size of the moon but the light emitting from it was ridiculous. the most odd color i've ever seen naturally.
content.summary: Unbelievably blue/teal light shot down in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Instaed of the normal round moon shaped mirror type lite with amber colors floating over the hill tops, we have now rescently seen a triangle with 3 car size white radiant lights on each corner of the blackened shadowed drone looking triangle. came outta no where and zipped off and hovered for a moment then lights shined up and it zipped off like no bodies business!!! south east towards kettlemen city ca.
content.summary: Hovered, zipped off and hovered again and slowly blemished away with sudden pulsed direction.

content.detailedDescription: While watching a lifewatch  helicopter traveling in a nw direction, as it passed a friend asked me what was in the sky. looking we both obsvered a red colored round object' which then traveled behind a cloud bank.
content.summary: Observed lighted travleing from se to nw
